humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'pN0(0/10)LOVORO', which indicates that no metastatic carcinoma was found in the assessed 10 lymph nodes. This aligns with New Rule 11 and Modified Rule 6, supporting an N0 stage. The report also mentions 'Follow-up finding: three times a metastatic infiltration and also an influx of individual cells of the invasive lobular breast carcinoma into the excised axillary lymph node is definitely excluded', further confirming the N0 stage.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'pN0(0/10)LOVORO' which indicates that there is no metastatic infiltration in the examined 10 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
